casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Douglas Wayne STANALAND 333P18-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2019 Douglas Wayne Stanaland, for Stanaland, Douglas Wayne. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of May 2019 by Defendant for Injunctive Relief:

*458"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2019."
